articles.description: B.J. Taylor scored 22 points and made a key shot and two free throws with 16 seconds to help Central Florida beat Memphis 68-64 on Sunday.
articles.headline: UCF ends two-game skid beating Memphis 68-64

articles.description: Bakari Evelyn scored 22 points with four 3-pointers, Max Joseph had 10 of his 12 points in the second half and Valparaiso beat short-handed Illinois State 74-58 on Sunday.
articles.headline: Valparaiso beats short-handed Valparaiso 74-58

articles.description: Lucas Siewert scored a career-high 17 points, including a pair of 3-pointers down the stretch, and the Colorado Buffaloes beat the Stanford Cardinal 64-56 Sunday for their third win in a row.
articles.headline: Buffs win third straight as Colorado downs Stanford 64-56

articles.description: Kavion Pippen scored 21 points with eight rebounds and four blocks and Southern Illinois defeated Bradley 74-57 on Sunday to take over sole possession of second place in the Missouri Valley Conference.
articles.headline: Southern Illinois alone in 2nd in MVC after win over Bradley

articles.description: Upset Saturday in the Big 12 saw four of the league's top five teams lose. No. 19 West Virginia must shake the sting of blowing a late six-point lead at home against Oklahoma State.
articles.headline: No. 19 West Virginia looking to bounce back vs. TCU

articles.description: Bearcats senior Kyle Washington drops 17 points and leads Cincinnati to a 76-51 win over SMU, extending Cincy's perfect streak in the American Athletic Conference.
articles.headline: Cincinnati gets road win over SMU

images.caption: Bearcats senior Kyle Washington drops 17 points and leads Cincinnati to a 76-51 win over SMU, extending Cincy's perfect streak in the American Athletic Conference.
images.name: Cincinnati gets road win over SMU
